message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair offer.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,250?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $10,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can agree on this price.
